description:
Hunter Ford is a little hung over. Seems he had a little too much to drink and ended up spacing his license. Luckily he's got a friend like Rod Daily. Rod just so happened to find Hunter's license last night at the club, so he went ahead and picked it up for him. But getting it back is not going to be so easy. Hunter is going to have to earn it... by sucking his cock and letting Rod fuck his sweet hole.

Enjoy!
title: LICENSE TO FUCK
